main.intro: I'm an IT engineer specialized in data, AI, and application development.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm Amine SABBAHI, 26 years old and recently graduated from ESIEA, an engineering school specialized in digital technology. Curious and passionate about web development and new technologies, I love exploring the latest trends and pushing the boundaries of what's possible. My journey has taught me to be rigorous and persevering, but also to appreciate teamwork and moments of sharing.

tutoring.description: Assistance for school and university homework.

webdev.description: Creation of custom websites and mobile applications.

bots.title: Bot Development
bots.description: Creation of WhatsApp, Telegram, and Discord bots.

scraping.title: Web Scraping
scraping.description: Data collection from websites for analysis.

freelance.title: Data Analysis & Development
freelance.description: Consulting in data analysis and solution development.
